Detailed Description

This class represent a marker dictionary as a vector of MarkerCodes.

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int aruco::Dictionary::distance ( MarkerCode  m,
unsigned int &  minMarker,
unsigned int &  minRot 
)

Return the distance of a marker to the dictionary, D(m,D) (Equation 7) Assign to minMarker the marker index in the dictionary with minimun distance to m Assign to minRot the rotation of minimun hamming distance.

The rotation refers to the marker passed as parameter, m

References aruco::MarkerCode::size().
